rows.label: kizunainn079_msg0001
rows.name:
Were you able to rest well?
I have one message for you.

rows.label: kizunainn079_msg0002
rows.name:
"Bring Ten'i and come to Theospiti
Temple" [ML:Dash ]is what it said.

rows.label: kizunainn079_msg0003
rows.name:
A man came, but[ML:Dash ] he left immediately,
so I don't know his name either.

rows.label: kizunainn079_msg0004
rows.name: But, I certainly passed it on, okay!
